Class SmoothMover

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • SmoothMover
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapCharacter
    public abstract class SmoothMover
extends greenfoot.Actor
    A variation of an actor that maintains a precise location (using floats for the co-ordinates instead of ints). This allows small precise movements (e.g. movements of 1 pixel or less) that do not lose precision.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Poul Henriksen, Michael Kolling, Neil Brown
